}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 1x1:1 SISO, 150Mbps
{{WiFiCert|WFA11956|05/31/2011}}
OEM [[Edimax EW-7711UAn]] ("PN: 1244-00000595-01Z" is silkscreened on the board) :NDD9577110812 is the FCC ID of the parent product. It is probably not printed on any of the [[D-Link]] units.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.dlink.co.uk/cs/Satellite?c=Product_C&childpagename=DLinkEurope-GB%2FDLProductCarouselMultiple&cid=1197391875146&p=1197318962342&packedargs=locale%3D1195806691854&pagename=DLinkEurope-GB%2FDLWrapper Product page (UK)]
